patterns: Tell me more about Indian Chilli Express
Information about Indian Chilli Express pizza
Tell me more about Indian Chilli
responses: Indian Chilli Express is a fiery fusion on an Italian sourdough base, featuring hot chili sauce, mozzarella cheese, jalapeno green, red paprika, green chilies, and black olives for a truly spicy pizza experience.

patterns: Tell me more about Peri Peri Paneer
Information about Peri Peri Paneer pizza
Tell me more about Peri Peri
responses: Peri Peri Paneer is a delectable blend of Italian and Indian flavors, on an Italian sourdough base, featuring zesty pizza sauce, melted mozzarella cheese, and a flavorful trio of juicy paneer, crisp capsicum with spicy red paprika.

patterns: Tell me more about Cheesy Jain
responses: Cheesy Jain is a vegetarian delight on an Italian sourdough base, made with Jain pizza sauce, marinated paneer, zucchini, green capsicum, black olives, and red paprika, delivering a deliciously cheesy flavor experience.

patterns: Tell me more about Mauritian Chilli Shock
Information about Mauritian Chilli Shock pizza
Tell me more about Mauritian Chilli
responses: Mauritian Chilli Shock is a premium Italian sourdough pizza, combining a traditional base with the bold kick of Mauritian green chili sauce and creamy mozzarella cheese for a tantalizing taste sensation.

patterns: Tell me more about Butter Garlic Pinwheel
Tell me more about Butter Garlic
responses: Butter Garlic Pinwheel is a buttery, crispy pastry with a hint of garlic for a light, satisfying snack.

patterns: Tell me more about Mexican Roll
responses: Mexican Roll features stuffed bread rolls with ample amounts of cheese and spice that guarantees your need for a light snack.
Corn & Spinach Parcel features parcel-shaped puff pastry with spinach and shelled corn fillings, delivering a burst of cheese in every bite.

patterns: Tell me more about Cheesy Italian Mushroom
Tell me more about Italian Mushroom
responses: Cheesy Italian Mushroom is packed with cheese and Italian mushroom filling for a burst of earthy flavors in every bite.

patterns: Tell me more about Tandoori Paneer
responses: Tandoori Paneer features Dhaba style aromatic Punjabi paneer tikka filling that elevates your taste buds with the cheesy and spicy notes.

patterns: Tell me more about Hot Latina
responses: Hot Latina is a crunchy pizza pack filled with fiery Mexican bean and chili filling, delivering a spicy flavor explosion.

patterns: Tell me more about Mozzarella Delight
responses: Mozzarella Delight is a traditional pizza with its flavors kneaded into the premium Italian sourdough base, loaded with a generous amount of cheese.

patterns: Tell me more about Peri Peri Onion Pizza
Information about Peri Peri Onion Pizza
Tell me more about Peri Peri Pizza
responses: Peri Peri Onion Pizza features the bold flavors of a premium Italian sourdough base with rich pizza sauce, melty mozzarella cheese, and the fiery tang of peri peri onions.

patterns: Tell me more about American Corn Pizza
Tell me more about Corn Pizza
responses: American Corn Pizza is a fusion of Italian and American cuisines, featuring an Italian sourdough crust topped with tangy pizza sauce, melted mozzarella cheese, and sweet, crunchy tender corn kernels, creating a delightful taste sensation.

patterns: Tell me more about Cheesy Jalapeno Pizza
Tell me more about Jalapeno Pizza
responses: Cheesy Jalapeno Pizza is a zesty premium Italian sourdough pizza featuring a classic base, creamy cheese, and the fiery kick of pickled jalapeno chilies for a spicy twist.

patterns: Tell me more about Fresca Veggie
Tell me more about Veggie Pizza
responses: Fresca Veggie is an authentic Italian sourdough pizza recipe loaded with fresh vegetables like green peppers, corn, and onion, baked to perfection.

patterns: Tell me more about Srilankan Sambal
Tell me more about Sambal Pizza
responses: Srilankan Sambal is a spicy culinary adventure featuring traditional Italian sourdough pizza with zesty pizza sauce, gooey mozzarella cheese, and the fiery kick of Sri Lankan sambal. It topped with green chilies, tangy pickled onions, black olives, and American corn for a layered explosion of flavors.

patterns: Tell me more about Classic Italian Margarita
Tell me more about Margarita Pizza
responses: Classic Italian Margarita features a premium Italian sourdough base adorned with pizza sauce, cherry tomatoes, English cheddar, fresh basil, and aromatic herbs, offering an enduringly delightful flavor experience.

American Mushroom & Onion BBQ features a premium Italian sourdough base topped with pizza sauce, melty mozzarella cheese, savory mushrooms, onions, a drizzle of smoky BBQ sauce, and a sprinkle of herbs for a savory and sweet fusion.

patterns: Tell me more about Whole Wheat Green Velvet
Information about Whole Wheat Green Velvet
Tell me more about Green Velvet Pizza
responses: Whole Wheat Green Velvet is infused with the goodness of Italian whole wheat sourdough, tangy spinach sauce, creamy mozzarella cheese, and a colorful medley of red capsicum, green capsicum, onion, baby corn, and black olives for a burst of Mediterranean flavors.

patterns: Tell me more about Gluten Free Pizza
Tell me more about Gluten Free
responses: Gluten Free Pizza offers a crispy, enticing wedge for the health-conscious. This pizza is low carb, gluten free, and delivers the classic pizza taste in a super filling option.

patterns: Where can I find your shops?
responses: Our Fasta Pizza shops are located in Gopalapuram, Perungudi, Uthandi, Mahindra City, Mylapore, Vivira Mall, and Chromepet.

patterns: Can you deliver to my place?
responses: Yes, we offer delivery services.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We accept credit/debit cards, digital wallets, upi and cash on delivery.
You can contact our support team at info@fastapizza.com or call us at +91 7370057005 or +91 9150257666.

patterns: What happens if my delivery is late?
responses: We apologize for any delays. If your delivery is late, please contact our support for assistance and compensation.

patterns: Can you give me some pizza cooking tips?
responses:
Sure! Here are some pizza cooking tips:
1. Preheat your oven to the highest temperature.
2. Use a pizza stone for a crispier crust.
3. Let your dough rest at room temperature before stretching.
4. Don't overload your pizza with toppings.
5. Bake your pizza until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbling.

patterns: How do I create an account?
responses: You can create an account by clicking on the 'Sign Up' button on our website and filling out the registration form.

patterns: How do I update my account information?
responses: You can update your account information by logging into your account and going to the 'Profile' section.

patterns: How do I delete my account?
responses: You can delete your account by contacting our support team at info@fastapizza.com.

patterns: How do I check my loyalty points?
responses: You can check your loyalty points balance by logging into your account and going to the 'Loyalty Points' section.
